display_long_description:
# Master and Maintain Authentic Weapons
Every firearm in Into the Radius 2 is recreated with realism, each having unique handling and features. Customize your arsenal with attachments to fit your playstyle. Survival means caring for your weapons — clean and maintain them regularly to ensure peak performance. Neglect can be deadly.

# Customize Your Gear
Fully control your loadout with deep customization for Chest Rigs, Armor Vests, and Backpacks. Use presets or build from scratch, arranging pouches and holsters exactly where and how you want. Design your gear to match your tactics and comfort.

# Survive Deadly Anomalies and Hostile Entities
Explore the Pechorsk Anomaly, where environmental hazards and hostile enemies test your skills. Face Mimics — intelligent humanoid foes using tactics like cover and communication — and monsters like regenerative Fragments and fast Creeps. Survival requires sharp wits and careful use of weapons and tools.

# Manage Resources and Complete Missions
Scavenge supplies, manage gear, and defend yourself in a world where every resource counts. Return to your Base to maintain weapons, organize gear, trade, and plan. Complete UNPSC missions to raise your Security Level and unlock advanced equipment.

# Choose Your Approach
Go solo for an immersive experience or team up with another Explorer for coordinated action. Adapt, make every choice count, and uncover the mysteries at the heart of the Pechorsk Anomaly.
